text: PFTC may refer to: * Primary fallopian tube cancer * PFTC Sports Center, Las Vegas, Nevada, US; See Jean-Paul Mendy * Putnam Fiduciary Trust Company; See 2003 mutual fund scandal * Pacific Film and Television Commission, renamed Screen Queensland; See K-9 * Platform Functional Test Console; See LN-3 Inertial Navigation System
title: PFTC
